summary: On a farm in the Canadian North-West, a young widow becomes the source of a jealous rivalry between her little son and her new husband.

Johnson|Mike Lally|Louis Manley|Richard Monahan|Ralph Montgomery|Freeman Morse|Joe Ploski|Jack Raine
keywords: farm|saskatchewan canada|based on novel|redheaded woman|face slap
title: La mujer obsesionada
